info.title: EfficientTutor Backend
info.description: The backend API for the EfficientTutor platform.

post.description:
Authenticates a user and returns an access token.
Uses OAuth2PasswordRequestForm (username & password fields).

Handles the creation of a new parent user.
Timezone and currency are determined automatically from the request IP.

Handles the creation of a new teacher user.
Timezone and currency are determined automatically from the request IP.

get.description: Returns the profile information for the currently authenticated user.
Gets all teachers that match a specific specialty query.

schema.title: Response Get All By Specialty Teachers By Specialty Get

get.description:
Retrieves all specialties for a specific teacher.
Authorized for the teacher themselves or an admin.

schema.title: Response Get Specialties For Teacher Teachers  Teacher Id  Specialties Get

post.description: Adds a new specialty to a teacher's profile.

delete.description: Deletes a specialty from a teacher's profile.

get.description:
Retrieves a list of all tuition templates visible to the current user.
The response model varies based on the user's role.

post.description:
Triggers a full regeneration of all tuition templates.
This is a powerful administrative action that rebuilds tuitions based on
current student subject enrollments.
**This endpoint is restricted to Admins only.**

get.description:
Retrieves a single tuition template by its ID.
The response model varies based on the user's role.

schema.title: Response Get Tuition Tuitions  Tuition Id  Get

patch.description:
Updates a tuition template's details (e.g., duration, charges).
Restricted to the owning teacher. Returns the updated tuition from the teacher's perspective.

post.description: Creates a meeting link for a tuition. Restricted to the owning teacher.

patch.description: Updates an existing meeting link for a tuition. Restricted to the owning teacher.

delete.description: Deletes a meeting link from a tuition. Restricted to the owning teacher.

get.description:
Retrieves the generated timetable for the current user.
- For a Teacher, returns their full schedule.
- For a Parent, returns the schedules for all their children.
- For a Student, returns their personal schedule.

Retrieves a list of all tuition logs relevant to the current user.
The response model varies based on the user's role.

schema.title: Response List Tuition Logs Tuition Logs  Get

post.description: Creates a new tuition log. Restricted to Teachers only.

get.description:
Retrieves a single tuition log by its ID.
The response model varies based on the user's role.

schema.title: Response Get Tuition Log Tuition Logs  Log Id  Get

patch.description: Voids a specific tuition log. Restricted to the owning Teacher.

post.description:
Corrects a tuition log by voiding the old one and creating a new one.
Restricted to the owning Teacher.

get.description: Retrieves a list of all payment logs relevant to the current user.

schema.title: Response List Payment Logs Payment Logs  Get

post.description: Creates a new payment log. Restricted to Teachers only.

get.description: Retrieves a single payment log by its ID.

patch.description: Voids a specific payment log. Restricted to the owning Teacher.

post.description:
Corrects a payment log by voiding the old one and creating a new one.
Restricted to the owning Teacher.

get.description:
Retrieves a financial summary for the current user.
- For a Teacher, shows total owed, credit held, and lessons given.
- For a Parent, shows total due, credit balance, and unpaid lesson count.

schema.title: Response Get Financial Summary Financial Summary  Get

get.description: Retrieves a list of all notes visible to the current user.

post.description: Creates a new note. Restricted to Teachers only.

get.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID.

patch.description: Updates an existing note. Restricted to the owning Teacher.

delete.description: Deletes a specific note. Restricted to the owning Teacher.

AdminRead.title: AdminRead
AdminRead.description:
Pydantic model for reading an Admin.
Includes fields from db_models.Admins.

AdminUpdate.title: AdminUpdate
AdminUpdate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when UPDATING an admin.
All fields are optional to allow for partial updates.

AvailabilityIntervalCreate.title: AvailabilityIntervalCreate
AvailabilityIntervalCreate.description:
Pydantic model for creating an availability interval.
Corresponds to db_models.AvailabilityIntervals.

AvailabilityIntervalRead.title: AvailabilityIntervalRead
AvailabilityIntervalRead.description:
Pydantic model for reading an availability interval (Student or Teacher).
Corresponds to db_models.AvailabilityIntervals.

AvailabilityIntervalUpdate.title: AvailabilityIntervalUpdate
AvailabilityIntervalUpdate.description:
Pydantic model for updating an availability interval.
All fields are optional.

CustomLogInput.title: CustomLogInput
CustomLogInput.description: Validates the request body for creating a CUSTOM tuition log.

CustomTuitionChargeInput.title: CustomTuitionChargeInput
CustomTuitionChargeInput.description: Validates a single student charge within a custom log POST request.

LogChargeRead-Input.title: LogChargeRead
LogChargeRead-Input.description: A lean representation of a charge within a log (for a teacher's view).

LogChargeRead-Output.title: LogChargeRead
LogChargeRead-Output.description: A lean representation of a charge within a log (for a teacher's view).

MeetingLinkCreate.title: MeetingLinkCreate
MeetingLinkCreate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when CREATING a new link.
'tuition_id' is NOT included here because it will be provided
via the URL path (e.g., /tuitions/{tuition_id}/meeting_link).

MeetingLinkRead.title: MeetingLinkRead
MeetingLinkRead.description:
Pydantic model for formatting a link when READING it from the API.
This is what will be nested inside the TuitionRead... models.

MeetingLinkUpdate.title: MeetingLinkUpdate
MeetingLinkUpdate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when UPDATING a link.
All fields are optional for partial PATCH updates.

NoteCreate.title: NoteCreate
NoteCreate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when CREATING a new note.
This is what the frontend sends in a POST request.
'teacher_id' is excluded and will be added by the service.

NoteRead.title: NoteRead
NoteRead.description:
Pydantic model for formatting a note when READING it from the API.
This is what is sent back to the frontend in a GET request.

NoteUpdate.title: NoteUpdate
NoteUpdate.description:
NEW: Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when UPDATING a note.
All fields are optional to allow for partial updates (PATCH).

ParentCreate.title: ParentCreate
ParentCreate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when CREATING a new parent.
This is used for parent sign-up.
Timezone and currency will be determined automatically by the backend.

ParentRead.title: ParentRead
ParentRead.description:
Pydantic model for reading a Parent.
Includes fields from db_models.Parents.

ParentUpdate.title: ParentUpdate
ParentUpdate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when UPDATING a parent.
All fields are optional to allow for partial updates.

PaymentLogCreate.title: PaymentLogCreate
PaymentLogCreate.description: Validates the request body for creating a new payment log.

PaymentLogRead.title: PaymentLogRead
PaymentLogRead.description: The API model for a payment log.

ScheduledLogInput.title: ScheduledLogInput
ScheduledLogInput.description: Validates the request body for creating a log from a SCHEDULED tuition.

ScheduledTuitionReadForParent-Input.title: ScheduledTuitionReadForParent
ScheduledTuitionReadForParent-Input.description: API model for a scheduled tuition (Parent view).

ScheduledTuitionReadForParent-Output.title: ScheduledTuitionReadForParent
ScheduledTuitionReadForParent-Output.description: API model for a scheduled tuition (Parent view).

ScheduledTuitionReadForStudent-Input.title: ScheduledTuitionReadForStudent
ScheduledTuitionReadForStudent-Input.description: API model for a scheduled tuition (Student view).

ScheduledTuitionReadForStudent-Output.title: ScheduledTuitionReadForStudent
ScheduledTuitionReadForStudent-Output.description: API model for a scheduled tuition (Student view).

ScheduledTuitionReadForTeacher-Input.title: ScheduledTuitionReadForTeacher
ScheduledTuitionReadForTeacher-Input.description: API model for a scheduled tuition (Teacher view).

ScheduledTuitionReadForTeacher-Output.title: ScheduledTuitionReadForTeacher
ScheduledTuitionReadForTeacher-Output.description: API model for a scheduled tuition (Teacher view).

StudentCreate.title: StudentCreate
StudentCreate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when CREATING a new student.
Password is not included as it will be auto-generated.

StudentRead.title: StudentRead
StudentRead.description:
Pydantic model for reading a Student.
Includes fields from db_models.Students.

StudentSubjectRead.title: StudentSubjectRead
StudentSubjectRead.description:
Pydantic model for reading a student's subject details.
Corresponds to db_models.StudentSubjects.

StudentSubjectWrite.title: StudentSubjectWrite
StudentSubjectWrite.description:
Pydantic model for creating/updating a student's subject details.
Corresponds to db_models.StudentSubjects.

StudentUpdate.title: StudentUpdate
StudentUpdate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when UPDATING an existing student.
All fields are optional to allow for partial updates (PATCH).

TeacherCreate.title: TeacherCreate
TeacherCreate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when CREATING a new teacher.
This is used for teacher sign-up.
Timezone and currency will be determined automatically by the backend.

TeacherRead.title: TeacherRead
TeacherRead.description: Pydantic model for reading a Teacher.

TeacherSpecialtyRead.title: TeacherSpecialtyRead
TeacherSpecialtyRead.description:
Pydantic model for reading a teacher's specialty.
Corresponds to db_models.TeacherSpecialties.

TeacherSpecialtyWrite.title: TeacherSpecialtyWrite
TeacherSpecialtyWrite.description: Pydantic model for creating/updating a teacher's specialty.

TeacherUpdate.title: TeacherUpdate
TeacherUpdate.description:
Pydantic model for validating the JSON payload when UPDATING a teacher.
All fields are optional to allow for partial updates.

TuitionChargeDetailRead-Input.title: TuitionChargeDetailRead
TuitionChargeDetailRead-Input.description:
A detailed charge model for the Teacher's view.
Includes Student and Parent info.

TuitionChargeDetailRead-Output.title: TuitionChargeDetailRead
TuitionChargeDetailRead-Output.description:
A detailed charge model for the Teacher's view.
Includes Student and Parent info.

cost.title: Cost
cost.description: The new cost for the student, must be positive.

TuitionChargeUpdate.title: TuitionChargeUpdate
TuitionChargeUpdate.description: Specifies a new cost for a single student within a tuition.

TuitionLogReadForParent-Input.title: TuitionLogReadForParent
TuitionLogReadForParent-Input.description: The API model for a tuition log as seen by a parent or student.

TuitionLogReadForParent-Output.title: TuitionLogReadForParent
TuitionLogReadForParent-Output.description: The API model for a tuition log as seen by a parent or student.

TuitionLogReadForStudent-Input.title: TuitionLogReadForStudent
TuitionLogReadForStudent-Input.description:
The API model for a tuition log as seen by a STUDENT.
Shows NO financial details.

TuitionLogReadForStudent-Output.title: TuitionLogReadForStudent
TuitionLogReadForStudent-Output.description:
The API model for a tuition log as seen by a STUDENT.
Shows NO financial details.

TuitionLogReadForTeacher.title: TuitionLogReadForTeacher
TuitionLogReadForTeacher.description: The API model for a tuition log as seen by a teacher.

TuitionReadForParent-Input.title: TuitionReadForParent
TuitionReadForParent-Input.description:
The API model for a tuition as seen by a PARENT.
Shows only their specific cost.

TuitionReadForParent-Output.title: TuitionReadForParent
TuitionReadForParent-Output.description:
The API model for a tuition as seen by a PARENT.
Shows only their specific cost.

TuitionReadForStudent-Input.title: TuitionReadForStudent
TuitionReadForStudent-Input.description:
The API model for a tuition as seen by a STUDENT.
Shows NO financial details.

TuitionReadForStudent-Output.title: TuitionReadForStudent
TuitionReadForStudent-Output.description:
The API model for a tuition as seen by a STUDENT.
Shows NO financial details.

TuitionReadForTeacher-Input.title: TuitionReadForTeacher
TuitionReadForTeacher-Input.description:
The API model for a tuition as seen by a TEACHER.
Shows full financial details.

TuitionReadForTeacher-Output.title: TuitionReadForTeacher
TuitionReadForTeacher-Output.description:
The API model for a tuition as seen by a TEACHER.
Shows full financial details.

min_duration_minutes.title: Min Duration Minutes
min_duration_minutes.description: The new minimum duration in minutes.

max_duration_minutes.title: Max Duration Minutes
max_duration_minutes.description: The new maximum duration in minutes.

TuitionUpdate.title: TuitionUpdate
TuitionUpdate.description:
The API model for updating a tuition's editable fields.
All fields are optional.

UserRead.title: UserRead
UserRead.description:
Base Pydantic model for reading user data.
Corresponds to the db_models.Users ORM model.
